description: Given a DAG (directed acyclic graph) with nodes P, G, S, N and directed edges P->N, G->S, P->S, P->G.

questions_and_answers.question: List all parents of node N.
How many children does node P have?
Is node G one of ancestors of node P?

Which of the following is one of descendants of node P?
A. S
B. T
C. E
D. W
Does node G have any descendants?
